CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 22, 1958, pg. 46 reads: "Sorority Hears Social Worker - These young ladies, members of Chi Omega Phi, junior sorority, seem very interested in what their guest speaker, Stanley Rideout, is saying. Mr. Rideout is a former supervisor in girls' division at Morganza.  he spoke to the sorority members about juvenile delinquency, the major causes of the ill, and methods of preventing it.  Left to right are Mr. Rideout, Dorothy Gloster, Gloria Williams, Patricia Prattis, Carole VeLar, Donna Drake.  Seated in the center are Lar, Barbara Garnett, Bernice VeLar and Donna Rideout and Erlene Adair. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Stanley Rideout lighting pipe and addressing members of Chi Omega Phi, back row from left: Dorothy or Patricia Gloster, Gloria Williams, Patricia Prattis, Carole VeLar, and Donna Drake; seated: Barbara Garnett, Bernice VeLar, Donna Rideout, and Erlene Adair, in living room with patterned rug and stone fireplace with mirror
